remarks: Lemma for ~ dia2dim .  Define a translation ` D ` whose trace is atom ` V ` .  Part of proof of Lemma M in [Crawley] p. 121 line 5. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia2dimlem3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem3.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem3.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem3.q $e |- Q = ( ( P .\/ U ) ./\ ( ( F ` P ) .\/ V ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.u $e |- ( ph -> ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.v $e |- ( ph -> ( V e. A /\ V .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.f $e |- ( ph -> ( F e. T /\ ( F ` P ) =/= P ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.rf $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) .<_ ( U .\/ V ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3.uv $e |- ( ph -> U =/= V ) $.
dia2dimlem3.ru $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) =/= U ) $.
dia2dimlem3.rv $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) =/= V ) $.
dia2dimlem3.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem3.dv $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` Q ) = ( F ` P ) ) $.
dia2dimlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( R ` D ) = V ) $.
